body: I create the JIRA ticket: https://issues.apache.org/jira/projects/COMDEV/issues/COMDEV-392

@MrXionGe  

Hi， you can config this ：

```
spring.shardingsphere.datasource.common.type=com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource
spring.shardingsphere.datasource.common.driver-class-name=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
spring.shardingsphere.datasource.common.username=root
spring.shardingsphere.datasource.common.password= 123456

spring.shardingsphere.datasource.ds_0.jdbc-url=jdbc:mysql://192.169.2.29:3306/demo_ds_0?serverTimezone=UTC&useSSL=false
spring.shardingsphere.datasource.ds_1.jdbc-url=jdbc:mysql://192.169.2.29:3306/demo_ds_1?serverTimezone=UTC&useSSL=false

```
why:
if you not config datasource common , in  springboot 2.4 May be NullpointExcepiton

you also see #8299

>In my druid configuration I have those params, after 180s force remove the connection, But sharding-jdbc cached physical connections, So I want to know does sharding-jdbc will be notified or not when druid remove the connection

Hi, if you physical connection may be removed , sharding-jdbc will  not be notified .。 so you question is not support batch Insert？
